title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, November 23, 2019
description: On this day 1924, that astronomer Edwin Hubble announced his discovery of the Andromeda Nebula, the first galaxy identified outside our own.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day 1924, that astronomer Edwin Hubble announced his discovery of the Andromeda Nebula, the first galaxy identified outside our own.
